title: Tarragon stuffed crown of lamb with duchess potatoes
description: It might be a 70s throwback, but it's no less delicious for it. If you want the full effect but don't have the white caps for the bone ends you can use foil instead.
ingredients: 1 small bunch picked tarragon, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 x 7-bone French trimmed racks of lamb
